11c62d9b137b9bad8b98d198db7d4d1766dd0c82.query: SELECT nonce_public, nonce_secret FROM oracle.digits WHERE event_id = $1 ORDER BY digit_index;

400a002758add82137ef65940c7161be66ae0b13.query: SELECT digits, precision, maturity, announcement_signature, outcome FROM oracle.events LIMIT 1

44469f2891756c3a8db274a5864087df30278436.query: SELECT nonce_public, signature FROM oracle.digits WHERE event_id = $1 ORDER BY digit_index;

97fb8b25de4a330fd7aa0f691df57295d210757e.query:
WITH events AS (
                UPDATE oracle.events SET outcome = $1::FLOAT8 WHERE id = $2::TEXT
            )
            UPDATE oracle.digits
        SET signature = bulk.sig, signing_ts = NOW(), nonce_secret = NULL
        FROM ( 
            SELECT *
            FROM UNNEST($3::BYTEA[], $4::VARCHAR[], $5::INT[]) 
            AS t(sig, id, digit)
            ) AS bulk 
        WHERE event_id = bulk.id AND digit_index = bulk.digit

e35cb6bb966d89bac746f562f84520240396f592.query: SELECT digits, precision, maturity, announcement_signature, outcome FROM oracle.events e WHERE e.id = $1
